attributes.action: Stop the free loaders coming into the UK and look after our own first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pied piper is playing for those coming in to the uk from abroad, do you wonder why the immigrants do not stop at the first country they come to, which is what they are meant to if claiming assilam, when they can come to the uk and to get free houses, cars and referbs to there homes, and give nothing towards, or in return.. Stop this now and use this money to pay of the debt you have made for this country and support our troops and reinstate the T.A.. Lives of soldiers will be lost due to the lack of support you show, their blood will be on your hands...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
